net.jawr.web.resource.handler.reader

Class PathPrefixedServletContextResourceReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.jawr.web.resource.handler.reader.BaseServletContextResourceReader
      • net.jawr.web.resource.handler.reader.PathPrefixedServletContextResourceReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ResourceBrowser, ResourceReader, ServletContextResourceReader, StreamResourceReader, TextResourceReader

    public class PathPrefixedServletContextResourceReader
extends BaseServletContextResourceReader
    This class defines a resource handler which is based on the servlet context (so which retrieves the resource from the web application), and which use a path prefix to access the resource. For example : if the pathPrefix is set to /css/section1/, to access the resource /css/section1/subsectionA/flower.css, we must use => /subsectionA/flower.css. The path prefix will be automatically added.
    Author:
    Ibrahim Chaehoi
